full_summary:
# Maintenance and Repairs of Generators

## Overview

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) invites qualified contractors to submit their bids for the maintenance and repairs of generators at the John H. Chapman Space Centre in Quebec. This bid solicitation supersedes a previous solicitation and is open to all qualified contractors.

## Bidding Streams

The CSA is seeking proposals for two separate streams:

### Stream 1: Maintenance and Repair of a KOHLER Generator

- The contractor will be required to provide equipment and labor for the annual inspection of all components of the regular preventative maintenance program for one KOHLER generator.

### Stream 2: Maintenance and Repair of Generators from Various Manufacturers

- The contractor will be required to provide equipment and labor for the annual inspection of all components of the regular preventative maintenance program for generators from GENERAC, DETROIT DIESEL, and JOHN DEERE.

## Proposal Requirements

- Contractors must submit their proposals no later than October 12, 2022, at 14:00 EDT.
- A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted proposals for the previous solicitation.
- The proposal must include a detailed plan for the annual inspection of all components of the regular preventative maintenance program for the specified generators.
- Contractors may bid on one or both streams.

## Details

- The successful contractor will provide equipment and labor to carry out the annual inspection of all components of the regular preventative maintenance program for the specified generators.
- The contract is expected to be awarded based on the evaluation of the proposals received.
- An optional site visit will be held on October 5, 2022, at 10:00 AM.
